entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MonoAOTCompiler: ensure only the relevant assemblies are in `aot-in` folder #58976
    7.0.0
  • MonoAOTCompiler: fast path "nothing changed" case #58975
  • Garbage Collector High Memory Load value is higher than available memory when running inside a container with cgroup memory limit #58974
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary linking after `Build`, when publishing from VS #58973
    6.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!replacedInLowering' #58972
  • HTTP/3 without AppContext switch doesn't give descriptive error #58971
  • [API Proposal]: Add Arm64 to ProcessorArchitecture and ImageFileMachine enums #58970
  • Modifying a file and then executing it can fail in on Linux #58964
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collections.Generic.SortedList<TKey, TValue> should have SetByIndex(Int32,TValue) #58962
  • Regression: Dynamic Code with String Interpolation and Field Resolver #58961
  • Incorrect Regex matching in Turkish culture when ignoring case #58958
    6.0.0
  • [mono] Possible GC hole in runtime invoke #58957
    6.0.0
  • Inconsistent Regex matching behavior in InvariantCulture #58956
    6.0.0
  • [fastthis] Delegate performance being eaten up by not passing `this` in dedicated register #58955
  • JIT: Redundant fmov's on arm64 for a simple function #58954
    7.0.0
  • JitDisasm disassembling arm vpop register list incorrectly #58950
    Future
  • Xamarin dll to run in android studio #58949
  • STJ failing ungracefully when attempting to serialize attributes #58947
    7.0.0
  • Add source generator unit tests for invalid JsonExtensionData cases #58945
    7.0.0
  • Test failure CurrencyNegativePattern_Get_ReturnsExpected_ByLocale in macOS 12 beta 8 #58944
  • Support JsonExtensionData in source generator fast path #58943
    7.0.0
  • [JIT] Asm difference for F# and C# methods #58941
  • Marshal.AllocHGlobal/FreeHGlobal is ~150x slower in .NET than legacy mono on device (tvOS) #58939
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator name conflicts #58938
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Non-allocating Span based APIs for Hex conversion #58937
  • System.Collections.Generic.Tests.ComparerTests.NullableComparisons test fails on iOS devices #58933
    7.0.0
  • IConfiguration with empty array elements #58930
  • TLS1.3 networking tests are flaky on Windows 11 #58927
  • DOTNET_ vs COMPlus_ env var prefix for creating dumps #58924
    7.0.0
  • AV when running MSBuild on bad invocation of VSD stub #58920
    6.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileInfo_GetSetTimes.CopyToNanosecondsPresent_LowTempRes #58916

Closed

  • DateTime.ToLocalTime offset calculation performance #38047
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add IComparable to MemberInfo #58842
    Future
  • Test Failure UnixPingUtilityTests.TimeoutIsRespected in macOS beta 8 #58946
  • Fix ARM32 floating point registers unwinding in PAL #57040
    6.0.0
  • JIT still seems to be hoisting some modified indirs #58877
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: (ptrdiff_t)generation_free_list_space (gen) >= 0 #57956
    6.0.0
  • JIT: pgo test failure in System.Runtime.Tests.dll #58373
    6.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Media.Test.SoundPlayerTests.LoadAsync_CancelDuringLoad_CompletesAsCanceled(cancellationCause: 0) #37140
    Future
  • Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName does not account for accessibility #57349
    6.0.0
  • Minor typo in inline comments in Decimal.cs #58695
    Future
  • System.IO.Pipelines need support targetframework NETStandard 2.1 #58925
  • [mono][loader] Drop MONO_ASMCTX_INTERNAL #37304
    7.0.0
  • Test failure CtorAndAccept_SocketNotKeptAliveViaInheritance #58903
    7.0.0
  • FltToInt: OverflowException in Debug and no exception in Release #58832
    6.0.0
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync cannot quit even if Close() is called. #58713
    Future
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms by avoiding the "-windows" RID #58495
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop\PInvoke\Vector2_3_4\Vector2_3_4\Vector2_3_4.dll #58899
    6.0.0
  • Linq XElement.Add adds text "None" into XML #58890
  • StringBuilder.Insert() overload to insert a character any number of times #58461
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Rename misleading members of TimeSpan #58848
  • API documentation debt - System.Net #43859
    6.0.0
  • CI System.Windows.Extensions.Test failure in "Libraries Test Run release mono Windows_NT x64 Debug" leg #41676
    Future
  • question about jit code on mono interal call cause crash. #58858
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid some null checks in the sgen alloc wrappers. #58968
    area-GC-mono
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #58965
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Replacement tokens in logging test baseline files #58963
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix lld support #58959
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • improve Immutable by checking its Count #58928
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/6.0] Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs (#58592) #58926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • fix SendAsync from inpersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58917
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • Fix an issue with ILStripping mscorlib.dll #58934
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove unused test libraries in baseservices/threading #58668
    area-System.Threading
  • Add crossgen2 runs for x86 (#58053) #58892
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Resolve overload ambiguities from lambda expression inference change #58953
    area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [release/6.0] Enhance CrossGen2 to emit PerfMap debug directory entry #58929
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Coalesce live var ranges right before reporting #58803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix Unix ARM floating point registers unwinding #58915
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use separate VNs for DBL2INT_OVF helpers #58931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Consider finally that jumps to itself as non-empty #58881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add info about .NET 6 compatibility with Intel CET shadow stacks and how to try it #58891
    documentation, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix unloadability issue in AppDomain::FindAssembly #58948
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: fix VN loop dependence when VN reaches budget limit #58921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix publishing symbols for `dotnet` and `hostpolicy` #58902
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58863
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix an issue with ILStripping mscorlib.dll #58935
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Enable more iOS/tvOS device tests #58846
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable global constant propagation for small types #57726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix race during cancellation of SoundPlayer.Load() due to timeout #58918
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Fix Type.GetTypeFromHandle nullable annotation #58901
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix minor typo in inline comments in Decimal.cs #58694
    area-System.Runtime
  • Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58775
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Remove MonoAssemblyContextKind MONO_ASMCTX_ enum #58802
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Use separate VNs for DBL2INT_OVF helpers #58868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58825
    area-Build-mono
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs #58592
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix SIMD temp register interference #58914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Ignore the DuplicateExtension status from macOS 12. #58889
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • documentation for HttpRequestOptions #58896
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58836
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] fix local build for NetCoreServer and RemoteLoopServer #58900
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add typeparam docs to interpolated string handler AppendFormatted methods #58875
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add delete operator in Crst class #58885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage, fix bug found #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58905
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58908
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #58912
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update libraries helix matrix #58637
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58910
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Enhance: BackgroundService blocked the execution of whole host #58851
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
  • [release/6.0] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst and test fixes for Android #58841
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Turn on the mobile device telemetry (XHarness workloads) #58864
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWasmRuntimes target and use cmake #58878
    area-Build-mono
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add JitStress=1/2 runs to jitstress-isas-x86 pipeline #58822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • I cannot config rd.xml for refleaction exception. Please help me #1428
  • F# printf with parameters causes MissingRuntimeArtifactException in Native binary #1542
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Constrained GVM test failure in Generics.cs #1484

Updated

  • COM interop support #306

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove duplicate TypeNames.cs and create IntPtr constant. #1550
    area-DllImportGenerator
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1549
  • Compile S.I.C.Native with CFG #1548
  • Srm unit test edits #1547

Merged

  • Refactor DllImportGenerator project for easier extensibility #1119
    area-DllImportGenerator
  • Move code around in Regex SRM #1543
  • Implement ComWrappers.RegisterForTrackerSupport to be able create CCW #1544
  • Cleanup after moving from CoreRT repo #1527
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Reflection fix - add test and dependency for GetDependenciesDueToAccess #1508

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor-wasm/Linux: getting two publish directories named `Publish`, and `publish` #20923
  • Given manifest layout ManifestReader should read out localized description #20922
  • SuppressTrimAnalysisWarnings should not be set for TFMs < 6.0 for EnableTrimAnalyzer #20921
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet workload update command fails with ArgumentNullException #20914
  • Implicit SourceGenerator: System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration (net 6.0) #20913
  • Error NETSDK1102 when publishing ASP.NET Core Hosted Blazor WebAssembly App for win-x86 from a win-x64 machine #20908
  • Add fsi to dotnet watch #20907
  • NuGet.targets incorrectly performs a url-decode on filesystem paths, resulting in projects not found #20901
  • The workingDirectory in the launchSettings.json does not work when use dotnet run #20885

Closed

  • With .NET 6 RC2 SDK zip installed, maui workload update failed in CLI. #20889
  • After upgrade from net6 rc1 to rc2, the setup failed. #20834
  • `dotnet watch run` fails on a new F# project #18650
  • dotnet watch verbose started does not show arguments #20843

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a test for SuppressRazorSourceGenerator incrementalism #20929
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix workload pack repair #20924
    Area-Workloads
  • Vary the cache key for TagHelpersFromReferences on SuppressRazorSourceGenerator #20920
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1355513 #20902
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Port updates to source generator from main #20918
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add command-line-api source-build dependency #20912
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Backport][Static web assets] Ensure subpath is always normalized (#20897) #20904
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Ensure dotnet root is not null #20898
    Area-Workloads
  • [Static web assets] Ensure subpath is always normalized #20897
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Merge release/6.0.1xx with rc1 #20877
    Area-Workloads
  • Report args in dotnet watch ProcessRunner #20844
  • Remove MMI dependency #20867
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • Pass in position to .GetSuggestions() #20852
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20793
    Area-NetSDK
  • Fix workload pack records serialization #20876
    Area-Workloads
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Event hookup in object initializer #5176

PullRequests

Created

  • Create using-alias-types.md #5174

Updated

  • Add proposal for using aliases allowing type parameters and additional target types #4452

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected errors are reported around synthesized tuple error fields #56327
  • Move XamlOptions back to Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Xaml #56324
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "using aliases for any types" #56323
    Compiler.Next
  • Ambigious call in PLinq Aggregate method due to C#10 lambda type inference #56319
    17.0
  • clicking on a specific error (CS5001) fails to reach the on-line search - #56318
    Backlog
  • IDE0060 (unused param) with NotImplementedException #56317
    Backlog
  • Navigating between lines in "Find References" result changes focus in an unexpected way #56313
    17.0

Closed

  • null reference in RemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #56304

PullRequests

Created

  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Support find refs on global aliases. #56326
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix equals operator with split state on right #56321
    Area-Compilers
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE
  • Create misc files workspace for LSP #56314
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Workaround for XamlOptions loading regression #56325
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56309
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move semantic classification caching down to Editor layer #56310
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Expose ServiceHub Core remote options to UnitTesing #56320
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix typo: Verson → Version #56115
    Next
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Prototype of how to potentially add `using alias = type` to the language. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor component doesn't render anymore after hot reload first try #36393
  • C# formatter returning invalid edits for some Razor scenarios #36390
  • Startup regression: json #36388
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #36387
  • Fix upgrade behavior for asp.net runtime in hosting bundle #36382
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor <PageTitle> component conflicts with svg <title> #36380
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException: The client has disconnected An operation was attempted on a nonexistent network connection. #36375
  • SecurityStampValidator reissues the session cookie and extends its expiry #36373
    6.0-rc2
  • Failed to launch debug adapter using .NET 5 Blazor WASM and IIS Express #36372
  • InputDate bug with DateTime? and min - max attributes #36371
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 Hot Reload taking as long as build time #36376
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 5, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107944-.NET5 #36357

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core SignalR C++ Client 32bit #36276
  • dotnet.js for AOTed apps needs a better cache-busting mechanism #30788
    6.0-rc2
  • Move FromQuery and other meta attributes to a separate lib #36369
  • IdentityUI no longer supports SxS views #30280
    6.0-rc2
  • Add user-secrets "get" command to CLI #27045
    Next sprint planning
  • dotnet-sdk-5.0.100-rc.1.20452.10 HTTPS Certificate Not Recognized, Removed and Added #28322
    Next sprint planning
  • ssh dotnet certificate #31415
    Next sprint planning
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis disposing connections while in use #36092
  • blazor multiple authentication cookie schemes not working #35832
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR messages are stalled for hours and lost #36020
  • Razor Pages Folder doesn't seen to see changes. #36038
  • Blazor WASM AuthorizationMessageHandler caches AccessToken even after user has changed #35888
    6.0-rc2
  • Issue: Consume multiple BlazorCustomElements in js-frameworks (React, Vue, etc) #36329
  • UseAngularCliServer blocked by node processes it's leaving open from prior execution #36250
  • Blazor WebAssembly .Net Core Hosted - Delete temp file after its downloaded to the browser #36282
  • Part2 - Improve error messages for implicit and explicit FromBody attribute in Minimal API #35405
    6.0-rc2
  • Create an analyzer to detect mismatched parameter optionality #34553
    6.0-rc2
  • Redundant FormatScope() override in FacebookHandler #36370
  • AuthenticationMiddleware should probably try all Schemes not just the default one. #36278
    Discussions
  • Cannot set Response.StatusText #36359
  • Resolve issues with dotnet-openapi tests in latest SDK #32686
    7.0-preview1
  • 5.0 docs: Kestrel config reload #26241
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor Hosted - Pass model to Server with NavigationManager #35530
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36395
    area-runtime
  • Honor sliding expiration in the security stamp validator #36394
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • DO NOT MERGE: Validating Helix docker fixups #36384
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix up solution file #36383
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services (#36064) #36381
    area-runtime
  • Cherry-pick mismatched parameter optionality analyzer and clean up directories #36379
  • Use one-shot static hash methods #36368
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [SignalR TS] Fix typo in Errors.ts #36367
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Handle shortened JSON file in dotnet openapi #36363
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi
  • [release/3.1] Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36362
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Capture `dotnet` dumps #36392
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [SPA] Update SPA submodule #36389
    7.0-preview1
  • Capture `dotnet` dumps #36385
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #36378
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • Set initial capacity for headers HashSet #36365

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Review current Android Shell Layouts #2456
  • Difference between Paint and Brush #2453
  • [Bug] [WinUI] When calling MainThread, System.InvalidOperationException: 'Unable to find main thread.' #2451
  • [Bug] [WinUI] NavigationBar does not disappear when HasNavigationBar set to false. #2450
  • [Bug] VS project templates indistinguishable from Legacy templates #2449
  • [Bug] Cannot deploy Maui. Net Blazor App to Windows, files missing from build #2447
  • [Bug] Blazor css isolation does not work in WinUI application #2446

Closed

  • How to assign the default Handler of a Maui control? #2411
  • [Bug] Could not resolve type with token 01000008 from typeref (expected class 'System.Drawing.BitmapSuffixInSatelliteAssemblyAttribute' in assembly 'System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a')' #2399

PullRequests

Created

  • Add extension method for modifying an existing mapping. #2458
  • Add option to specify static factory method for creating native views #2457
  • [Android] Wire up text for SearchBar and Editor #2454
  • Consolidate Subviews clearing methods #2452
  • use relativepath for XamlFilePath #2448
  • Border control #2445

Merged

  • [vs-insertion] Push packs to "shipping" feed #2440
  • [ci] Pass SkiaSharp extras to symbol archiving #2426

Updated

  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Android TabbedPageHandler #2432
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Easier way configure conversion for all properties of readonly struct type #25896
    6.0.0
  • Indentation is wrong when scaffolding DbContext without a namespace #25403
    6.0.0
  • Converting bool to DateTime throws InvalidCastException #25475
  • Please help to debug the dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold command #25888
  • Internal function parameter type added as entity type on model creation when model contains many-to-many relation #25879
  • Migrations do not work when an owned type property is called Item #25501
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Backing fields that participate in seeding not work properly, when we use them for transforming (change/reformat) the data that coming from or going to the database #25459
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Setting foreign key to null by PropertyEntry.CurrentValue deletes entity #25360
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Aggregate on optional dependent lacks condition #23230
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Transaction deadlocks within a simple DB model #14371
    6.0.0-rc2

Updated

  • Verify exceptions when Include() is used in invalid or not supported locations in a query #14671
    Backlog
  • Query: inconsistent behavior between relational and InMemory/L2O for queries grouping by a constant #19683
  • SqlServer: Split query involving Skip without OrderBy does not work #21202
  • Query/InMemory: compilation error for complex query with correlated collection and distinct #24291
    6.0.0
  • Query: parameter nullability sniffing broken for global query filters #24645
  • Incorrect insert SQL when composite key contains identity and default value properties #23941
    6.0.0
  • InMemory database provider with Boolean discriminator TPH fails #24657
    6.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException when projection is used with OData #24092
    6.0.0
  • Unable to translate collection subquery in projection #25315
    6.0.0
  • Simple uses of MathF fail on SQL Server #25421
    6.0.0
  • Test Comparison_with_value_converted_subclass fails on InMemory #25615
    6.0.0
  • SharedTypeQueryRelationalTestBase does not delimit identifiers in raw SQL #25661
    6.0.0
  • Query/InMemory: projecting (int?)(myBaseEntity as MyDerivedEntity).IntOnDerived defaults to 0 rather than null #25735
    6.0.0
  • Precompiling models and missing usings #25812
    6.0.0
  • InMemory database throwing NullReferenceException when using a nullable value-converted property in a query #25492
    6.0.0
  • Cosmos: Issues when loading derived type via base set and vice versa #25886
  • Comparison with TimeSpanToStringConverter doesn't work correctly for 1 day+ TimeSpans #25920
  • Expression of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.SingleQueryingEnumerable`1[System.Boolean]' cannot be used for return type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[System.Object]' #25958
  • Always encrypted numeric column is considered as decimal #25932
  • InMemory provider deletes wrong entry when DELETE and ADD for same PK #25905
  • dotnet-ef requires x64 SDK on macOS Monterey with Apple Silicon (M1) #25927
  • [Bug] The specified deps.json does not exist -- MAUI + Blazor stack with EntityFrameworkCore Migrations #25938
  • Consider not including a blank line between query tags #25414
    6.0.0
  • Flexible mapping to CLR types and members (Custom O/C Mapping) #240
    Epics
  • Improve many-to-many, skip navigations, and indexer properties #22960
    Epics

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Enable test for #24291 #25974
  • Add a way for providers to filter out non-identity conditions. #25973
  • Query: Add regression test for #24657 #25972
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25971
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Convert result of Round appropriately for MathF functions #25970
  • InMemory: Read nullable value for derived properties #25968
  • Handle nulls passed to typed equality method expression #25966
  • Generate multiple query tags without newlines between them #25963
  • More links to conceptual docs #25962

Merged

  • Apply pre-convention value converters on nullable types #25969
  • Make compiled model classes public and supporting classes internal #25967
  • Fix indentation when scaffolding with no namespace #25964
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25956
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Delete optional orphans when foreign key value is set to null #25957
  • More links to conceptual docs #25937
  • Make sure navigations on property bag entity types don't use CLR properties. #25960
  • Always sort deletes before inserts for the same table to avoid deadlocks. #25952
  • Query: Add condition when accessing property on optional dependent wh… #25949

Updated

  • Migrations: Honor [Column(Order)] in CreateTable operation #25942
    auto-merge
  • Fix to #19883 - Query: null semantics should keep track of columns that are guaranteed to be null and remove redundant IS NULL/ IS NOT NULL checks #25951
